}

}

#app {
  max-width: 1280px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  text-align: center;
}

@media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {

    color: #213547;
    background-color: #ffffff;
  }
  a:hover {
    color: #747bff;
  }

    background-color: #f9f9f9;
  }
}
